data.event: First settled in 1872, Ferndale was given its name because of the ferns that once grew around the original school house.
Ferndale was officially incorporated on March 19, 1907.

event.title: was once ransomed for a stack of blankets (1848

data.event: One colorful figure in Ferndale’s pioneer past is “Blanket Bill” Jarman (1820-1912) who was once ransomed for a stack of blankets (1848?) and acquitted of homicide (1871).
